programme.title: Flight 666
programme.desc: Passengers on an international flight are attacked by unseen forces and must fight to stay alive.

programme.title: Maniac Cop 3: Badge of Silence
programme.desc: Zombie cop Officer Matt Cordell's third ride from beyond the grave has him looking for a girlfriend.

programme.title: The Vault
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters are forced to rob a bank in order to save their brother.

programme.title: Ghosthunters
programme.desc: A team of ghost hunters is determined to capture the spirits of their loved ones.

programme.title: Possession
programme.desc: A woman's (Sarah Michelle Gellar) brother-in-law awakes from a coma claiming to be her husband.

programme.title: Zoombies
programme.desc: A mysterious virus turns animals at a safari park into bloodthirsty zombies.

programme.title: Dead Awake
programme.desc: From the creator of the Final Destination franchise comes the paralyzing thriller Dead Awake.

programme.title: The Music Box
programme.desc: An orphaned girl moves in with her aunt in an old Victorian house where she discovers a haunted music box.

programme.title: Frankenstein
programme.desc: An adaptation of "Frankenstein" in which a married couple of scientists create a modern-day monster.

programme.title: 666: The Child
programme.desc: An affluent couple (Adam Vincent, Sarah Lieving) adopt an orphaned boy who is pure evil.

programme.title: Bloodwork
programme.desc: College students learn to regret their decision to sign up as test subjects for a new drug.

programme.title: Day of the Dead
programme.desc: After zombies take over the world, a group of survivors struggles to survive within a bunker.

programme.title: FilmRise Horror
programme.desc: Scream along to horror classics like GINGER SNAPS, DAY OF THE DEAD and DRACULA, and witness weird supernatural tales starring Jamie Lee Curtis, Sydney Sweeney, Dan Stevens and other stars.
